title: [Bug]: Can't update to 2.0.11-1 - OpenPGP Keys error
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

Can't update the app on Fedora 42 via DNF due to PGP keys error

### What package are you using?

rpm

### Version

N/A

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Run `sudo dnf upgrade teams-for-linux`
2. Update fails with the following error:

Running transaction
Transaction failed: Signature verification failed.
OpenPGP check for package "teams-for-linux-2.0.11-1.x86_64" (/var/cache/libdnf5/teams-for-linux-52070eda2215cb3c/packages/teams-for-linux-2.0.11.x86_64.rpm) from repo "teams-for-linux" has failed: The repository does not have any OpenPGP keys configured.
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1. Update to install
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
